ruleBookInfo.author: span:contains(作者) > a@text
ruleBookInfo.kind: li:contains(分类) > span@text&&li:contains(状态) > span@text&&li:contains(更新) > span@text

ruleSearch.name:
<js>
x=java.getString("h2.0@text");
if (/第.+章/.test(x) || /《.+》/.test(x)) {
	b=null;
	}else{
		b=java.getString("h2.0@text")};
b;
</js>##^([^_]+)_.*##$1
